name: gpw_v4_density
title: GPW V4 Population Density (UN Adjusted)
description: Population density (UN Adjusted values) from GPW v4. Data provided in 30 arc-second (~1 km) grid cells.

extras.citation: Center for International Earth Science Information Network - CIESIN - Columbia University. 2016. Gridded Population of the World, Version 4 (GPWv4): Population Density Adjusted to Match 2015 Revision UN WPP Country Totals. Palisades, NY: NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC). http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4HX19NJ.
